name: Seneca Hackathon 2025
description: Next.js web app used as the main landing page and participants' registration for the Seneca Hackathon 2025. Implemented all base components, and led and mentored a team of 4 front-end engineers.

name: My Personal Website
description: My personal portfolio website designed to be simplistic and clean using shadcn/ui with Tailwind CSS, while including features like dark mode toggle, dialog components, and copy email to clipboard.

name: E-Commerce Website
description: College full-stack project to develop an e-commerce website using Bootstrap, Express.js and PostgreSQL, supporting a responsive layout, sign-up and sign-in functionalities items' creation, manipulation and deletion.

name: Factory Assembly Line App
description: A C++ resource management application that receives customer orders' and distribute them along workstations in an assembly line according to its items in stock to fulfill the orders

name: Dictionary Management Application
description: C++ app that reads multiple dictionary databases with over 200,000 words and categorizes them, while including searching for a word and displaying its definitions and part of speech where it's used.
